title: The Deal
overview: Geneva, April 2015. High-pressure international negotiations begin between the USA and Iran, which is suspected of secretly developing nuclear weapons. Alexandra Weiss, head of the Swiss diplomatic mission, is trying to maintain a fragile balance between the parties maneuvering behind the scenes. The unexpected arrival of her former love, Payam Sanjabi, an Iranian engineer whose life is under threat, will complicate her task dangerously.
